attributes.action: Ensure that Con. Andrea Leadsom MP is shortlisted as a candidate for PM
attributes.background: Throughout the EU campaign Andrea Leadson MP who was pro Brexit frequently appeared in debates and was articulate, intelligent, didn't evade questions, was never rude, was informative and displayed a good working knowledge of the city. She should be nominated as one of the front runners to be PM

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
